docs.snippet: Chinese telecom equipment maker ZTE, which is facing U.S. trade sanctions that could severely disrupt its supply chain, is slashing about 3,000 jobs, including a fifth of positions in its struggling handset business in China, company sources said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chinese telecom equipment maker ZTE, which is facing U.S. trade sanctions that could severely disrupt its supply chain, is slashing about 3,000 jobs, including a fifth of positions in its struggling handset business in China, company sources said.

headline.main: Exclusive: China's ZTE to Slash About 3,000 Jobs-Sources
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: China's ZTE to Slash About 3,000 Jobs-Sources

docs.snippet: The number of migrants reaching the European Union by sea fell by two-thirds in 2016 due to a migration deal with Turkey but arrivals in Italy from north Africa hit an all-time high, the EU said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The number of migrants reaching the European Union by sea fell by two-thirds in 2016 due to a migration deal with Turkey but arrivals in Italy from north Africa hit an all-time high, the EU said on Friday.

headline.main: Arrivals of Migrants to EU by Sea Two-Thirds Lower in 2016: Frontex
headline.print_headline: Arrivals of Migrants to EU by Sea Two-Thirds Lower in 2016: Frontex

docs.snippet: A train in Pakistan crashed into a motorised rickshaw on Friday, killing six children on their way to school and the rickshaw driver, the country's third deadly train crash in four months....
docs.lead_paragraph: A train in Pakistan crashed into a motorised rickshaw on Friday, killing six children on their way to school and the rickshaw driver, the country's third deadly train crash in four months.

headline.main: Train Hits Rickshaw in Pakistan Killing Six Children and Driver
headline.print_headline: Train Hits Rickshaw in Pakistan Killing Six Children and Driver

docs.lead_paragraph: Siemens chief Joe Kaeser said on Friday he does not expect the German engineering group to come under pressure from U.S. President-elect Donald Trump.

docs.snippet: A spending spree by British shoppers in the week before Christmas failed to prevent sales in December from falling short of the previous year's level, while shop prices are expected to surge in 2017, surveys showed on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A spending spree by British shoppers in the week before Christmas failed to prevent sales in December from falling short of the previous year's level, while shop prices are expected to surge in 2017, surveys showed on Friday.

headline.main: Retail Sales Edge Lower in December, Price Pressures Spiral-Surveys
headline.print_headline: Retail Sales Edge Lower in December, Price Pressures Spiral-Surveys

docs.snippet: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has threatened Toyota Motor Corp over its Mexican-built cars, but the biggest risk from a punitive tariff would be for its compatriot Nissan Motor Co, the largest automaker operating in the country....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has threatened Toyota Motor Corp over its Mexican-built cars, but the biggest risk from a punitive tariff would be for its compatriot Nissan Motor Co, the largest automaker operating in the country.

headline.main: As Trump Targets Toyota Over Mexico, Nissan Faces Bigger Risk
headline.print_headline: As Trump Targets Toyota Over Mexico, Nissan Faces Bigger Risk

docs.snippet: Euro zone retail sales fell in November on a monthly basis, after a surge in October, driven down mostly by a drop in purchases of non-food products, estimates released by Eurostat on Friday showed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Euro zone retail sales fell in November on a monthly basis, after a surge in October, driven down mostly by a drop in purchases of non-food products, estimates released by Eurostat on Friday showed.

headline.main: Euro Zone November Retail Sales Drop After October Surge
headline.print_headline: Euro Zone November Retail Sales Drop After October Surge

docs.snippet: A South Korean court on Friday convicted 14 people including a former head of the local unit of British consumer goods maker Reckitt Benckiser over the sale of humidifier sterilizers linked to deadly lung injuries, sentencing the former boss to se...
docs.lead_paragraph: A South Korean court on Friday convicted 14 people including a former head of the local unit of British consumer goods maker Reckitt Benckiser over the sale of humidifier sterilizers linked to deadly lung injuries, sentencing the former boss to seven years in prison.

headline.main: South Korea Court Convicts Ex-Reckitt Benckiser Unit Chief in Sterilizer Case
headline.print_headline: South Korea Court Convicts Ex-Reckitt Benckiser Unit Chief in Sterilizer Case

headline.main: British Airways Says Flights to Operate Next Week Despite Strike
